Title: Active Directory Driver
Description: A common library to be used for basic Active Directory access.  ADDriver provides a standard set of methods to use when working with Active Directory.  Especially useful for AD automation development.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A common library to be used for basic Active Directory access. ADDriver provides a standard set of methods to use when working with Active Directory. Especially useful for AD automation development.

The AD Driver project is composed of two individual visual studio projects: Wrangler and the ADDriver.  The ADDriver is a C# class library and the actual Active Directory driver.  Wrangler is a Windows Form project that serves as an example of how to use the ADDriver.
